title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set for row[0]
description: When setting a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0' or return null result set.
OB: When setting an invalid filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' in the data set and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned instead of the expected null result set.
EB: The data set should return a null result set when an invalid filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' is set.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to 0'. 
2. Click on the Preview tab. 

Expected: The data set should return a null result set, as row[0] cannot be used as a filter expression according to the developer.
